I bought this 1/4 zip sweater in a size Large.  I am 5' 8" and 150 lbs, I have long arms and the sleeve length is perfect.  I love the fit, softness and warmth of this sweater, it isn't itchy at all, which is something I pay attention to and care about since I have sensitive skin.

I love that it’s so soft.  It has long sleeve for tall girls.  To comfortable and medium weight, so not too warm.  You can wear in or out.  Great find!

Wow! I love, love this sweater. I live in Florida and hate sweaters but needed one for a holiday family picture. I ordered this a totally love it. It is super soft and what I would say is medium weight. Great fit, great quality, great buy.

To me there is waves material in the arms and sides  bunched  up under my arms. It  was uncomfortable and very bulky looking. I ordered a small and it was big. This sweater is soft and fits perfectly. Feels like a high end knit. It has body but not too thick

I loved this sweater and wore it *gently* on Christmas Eve, but it pilled up terribly and somehow had tons of snags (one huge one) after 1 wash on cool delicate cycle and gentle low drying. It was with other soft items, no reason for the fabric to look like it’s 10 yrs old after 1 wash. Disappointed because I really loved the sweater at first.

Great feel new out of the bag! Zipper was difficult to work, hoping it gets less stiff with use. Will definitely need a long shirt under it to keep warm, but it’s a nice fall/winter staple. I’m 5’ 5” and currently a 12-14 so I got the XL. When I get another color I will size down to a L, but I like size and color variation!
I really like the fit and quality of this sweater and how warm it is.
Good quality and color
I bought one…upon arrival immediately bought the black, grey and navy ones!  💯 % satisfaction!!!  Quality, fit, pricing - oh my gosh I LOVE these sweaters!  They’re perfect for fall - spring.
Wow, this small is huge!  The sizing is totally off. It's a nice sweater, but the sizing is way off. I got it for my daughter; she wears a small, and this fits like a large. Seriously?
This sweater is so soft and comfortable. The large was a bit too big but I’m keeping it because I love it. I’m ordering another color in a medium.

Sweater is gorgeous on. Warm and cozy. Knit fabric is soft as well as warm. Fits generously. I wear a 40dd and the size XL fit perfectly. It hugged me without being bulky and was not snug. Pink is a deep pink Fuschia. Have this sweater in 2 colors and considering other colors.
Nice soft sweater fits true to size

the fit was good. i ordered a large and it was a bit sloppy so moved to a medium and perfect. normally i do wear a large. the fabric is soft and not too heavy. wonder what will happen after i wash it, hop it does not shrink or change in fabric. as of now, this gives me the clean girl aesthetic.
well made true to size
The size is perfect. The fit is perfect. The color is perfect. It’s a good, thick sweater. Not cheap at all.

I have to be honest...I didn't expect much. I just wanted a sweater that I can wear with leggings or jeans. But this sweater really surprised me. It is soft, well made. The material is thick. Good stitching. The zipper is sturdy with a leather pull (which came wrapped in tissue paper!) No chemical smell at all. The sweater looks and feels like I paid way more for it. I intend on buying another. EDIT: The zipper doesn't lay flat at the bottom so it pokes out, leaving a little 'tent'. But that is easily fixed by snipping off the extra material at the bottom. RECOMMENDED.
I love this sweater. It's soft and warm. The collar keeps my neck warm!. I like this brand/ company.

I love the feel of this sweater. Just the right amount of weight for cooler winter weather and so very soft! It is stylish too. I haven’t washed it yet, but it it stays as soft and luxurious after washing I’m going to order more colors!
This sweater fits perfectly and is so soft. The green color is vibrant. The zipper works smoothly with a little leather tab. Nice touch!
This is a soft and comfy sweater that looks expensive.  I am about 170 and 5'4'' and I purchased a large.  Fit great with a shirt underneath and will keep you warm.

This is one of my favorite medium weight sweaters.  Great for 40-60 degree weather without anything underneath. It is soft, well made, it fit perfectly (sized well), the Color was supposed to be Navy and IS Navy. I am super happy with it.
Cozy without being too heavy.  Size perfect
I absolutely love this sweater!  It is the softest fabric and very well made.  Unfortunately for me it was too big and I am exchanging it for a smaller size but it won't make here for Christmas.

This sweater is wonderful. Very soft and not scratchy!  I bought the green and I get sooo many compliments on it!  Sleeves are a little long but I’m short so I just make a cuff and I LOVE THIS SWEATER!!!  Buy it!!
Great buy! Yarn is soft, color is lovely, fit is spot on. Buy your regular size for a slightly loose fit. If you prefer a slimmer fit, buy one size down. I will be buying more colors!

I'm broad shouldered and usually buy xl for the shoulders and bust, but the large was recommended and is a great fit!  Probably would translate to a 12-14 misses size. 评论概述: LOVE this attractive sweater with half zip!
评论详情: I purchased 3 of varying colors (Black, green, brown) because it is so attractive and comfy! The half zip tab is touched with a small bit of leather; a good working zipper. I cannot imagine this would not be becoming to any figure. I loved it so much I bought 3 colors and still contemplating other colors. However, I have yet to have it dry cleaned. Directions indicate dry cleaning due to questionable fabrics in it. For that, I gave it just a 4-star rating. (I don't expect problems and hope there won't be problems). In four days or so, I've worn them all and got many compliments on the green (during a Christmas party).
I really like this sweater! It is quality made, thick & warm, & so soft!
This is a very attractive sweater. It has a comfortable, roomy fit. (Not tight). The fabric is soft. I haven’t washed it yet, so I don’t know about durability, but am optimistic.
This sweater is such great quality! The tan color is so pretty. I ordered a small because I'm 5'7" and small chested. It fits great.
Sweater was soft, zipper worked. Would have kept it but it ran really big. Size down at least 1 size.
This sweater washed well in cold water (air dried).  Did not shrink or lose shape.  Soft, comfortable, cozy.  Color as shown.
Such a lovely sweater.  It was on the larger side so I had to return it.  Wish they had an XS available.
I loved this sweater so much I also purchased it in blue. Soft and thick. Perfect for winter. Highly recommend!
I’m 5’5” at 178 and ordered a large. It’s a bit big but I’m okay with that. It is very soft and luxurious feeling. Thinking of getting it in another color.

评论概述: Soft and maybe a bit oversized
评论详情: First of all, I just received this today! Was remarkably softer than I thought and also much better quality than I expected! I was afraid it might be too small but as you can see it is a little oversized. It is long in left and generous in body size but the banding/knitted bottom helps it to stay out around waist or hips if you want to wear it that way.  This one looks boxy on me because it’s a little too big but I’m going to see how it looks after I wash and dry( I usually air dry sweaters but will dry this one to see if it shrinks up at all)  On a final note? I will DEFINITELY be buying more in other colors as this is such a quality look and feel to it! It surprised me as I never buy anything but cardigans online because I need soft but structured pieces and I took a gamble and I love it! Will be cool enough to wear on cool not so cold evenings but warm enough to layer over a tank or tee if needed  Will update after wahsings

Not too heavy-I ordered a small , and I’m 5’1, 103 lbs, but wanted it a little larger so that if I wanted to layer then I would have more than enough room!! This color will definitely go with any bottoms and style that I pair it with!! So HAPPY THAT I PURCHASED THIS SWEATER!!!  Love it!❤️
My 17 year old daughter likes it.

What I like about this sweater is the style and the color. It is true to size so if you want it to fit like the model you will need to size up. The knit is nice and it is soft. I would prefer a higher quality fabrication, better quality zipper, natural fiber, and leather zipper pull instead of plastic. That said, for thirty dollars this is nice. I also have a couple of vests from this company and really like them.
This sweater is very comfortable and the sleeves are perfect for anyone with long arms which most sweaters aren’t.  This sweater also washes very welll.
The color is soft, the sweater is so soft. A perfect match for fall evenings.
If you have good taste, don’t get it.

I got  C t  g e gray since I have so little in tgst color and it’s a lovely shade, I plan to wear it with regular or black jeans, black bag and ankle boots for a mildly cool fall evening. Very happy with purchase!

This is the perfect sweater for business casual or even the holidays, or even daily wear when it is chilly!! The fit is a little big until you wash it then it slightly shrinks but not bad!! The material is so soft and cozy! The pattern gives it the little extra touch so it is not just a plain sweater. The half zipper makes it perfect for dress up and down outfits.

My wife's review ... I am really enjoying my new sweater. I ordered a medium and it has room in it for a comfy feel with a t-shirt underneath. I am 5'8" 145lbs. The zippered collar is well sewn and smooth functioning. The fabric is soft to the touch, not at all itchy. I got the 'navy blue' color, and I do think it is more of a slate blue but still is a beautiful color. Would definitely recommend!

I got this sweater in the grey color. It looks just what it looks like in the picture on the product page. It is super soft and very comfortable. The fabric is pretty stretchy (goes with being knit). The sleeves are slightly baggy, but cling toward the wrists as it shows in their pictures. I like the touch of the leather zipper tab which adds a little more style to the look. The whole thing looks nice and is great for a pretty, yet casual look. As a sweater, it is fairly warm. The fabric is probably close to a medium weight for a sweater, I have certainly seen heavier ones, but also see ones that are lighter. I wouldn’t call it super warm (I live in a colder area) but it does its job. Overall, I am pleased with it.

I was a little worried about the quality of the knit, but so far after a single wash, it still feels super soft and doesn't have any pulls or holes forming so that's a win! The sweater is true to size, though, so if you like a little more wiggle room, I would size up. Otherwise, if you prefer a more fitted look, order your normal size. I think this would work great at work for a pop of color in the colder months, or can be dressed down with jeans for a casual hangout or date night.
This is a beautiful sweater! This is identical to a Ralph Lauren sweater I bought for $165.00. GREAT QUALITY. This is a MUST BUY!
I love my new sweater. The color green is so pretty and the sweater is so soft.  You could wear this sweater for dress or for casual. I may have to buy it in another color! Runs TTS

This is a great, classic grey sweater! It's super soft and comfortable to wear. It's perfect for late fall and winter here in SoCal. I ordered the size Medium.  For reference, I'm 5'2" tall and 135lbs.
I was very surprised by this sweater. It's similar to a Ralph Lauren sweater I have. It's very thick and well made. Definitely getting more colors! Don't sit on this one!
I like the medium weight of this sweater. It fits comfortably.

I haven' t gotten the chance to wear this out yet since it's been hot, but it feels amazing. It's very soft and and the green is vibrant! I got a medium and I usually wear between 8-10, and it fits slightly oversized with plenty of space to layer shirts under it. This was a good find, especially for the price!

评论概述: nice sweater but a lil big
评论详情: Great sweater. Its simple and stylish perfect fall outfit. Its well knitted like the pattern. The zipper zip up smoothly. But this sweater is kinda big so I reccommend sizing down.

I ordered this sweater in Medium, in the color Beige. The color is exactly as pictured, but I would call it more of an ivory or cream. It's a nice, thick sweater that would be great in the winter. I think it's too thick even for Fall but I live in the South and it doesn't get very cold in the Fall. It is a very nice quality sweater and the faux leather zipper pull is a nice touch. I am 5'7" and 145 pounds. The Medium fits me perfectly and falls just below the waist. I did fold the bottom under so that it's a bit shorter. I like the way this looks and it holds up well. The sweater is very soft and comfortable (no itch or irritation). At about $29, it's a good buy. I've seen similar quality sweaters in brand name stores at much higher price points.
This sweater is a cute quarter zip cable knit sweater. It is true to size and the sizing is accurate. I’m a fan of Dokotoo products - this sweater is a good buy.
LArge oversized casual quarter zip  - thick and ribbed -  casual and comfortable.

I think this is a great sweater for the price.  It looks "high quality", it's classic, and it's flattering.  The material is soft, comfy, and has some stretch.  My one critique is that it comes vacuum packed which does save space so that's nice but it means it starts out rather wrinkled.

I like this sweater and it delivers if you are looking for a good quality heavy weight sweater. I agree with the reviews about the quality touches. I find this a bit oversized but great for a top layer during winter.  The color is nice but not quite as bright as pictured.

I am 5'9" 140 lbs. and ordered a medium and it fits great. This sweater is very slinky and soft. The color is beautiful. The sleeves go just to my wrists and it's slightly short when I extend my arms but I have longer arms. The zipper is a leather pull tab which looks nice. The woven pattern is beautiful as well. It is very warm and comfortable. I'd recommend laying it flat to dry.

The sweater from Dokotoo arrives neatly folded with tissue inside a sealed compressed bag. My wife's review:  This quarter zip pullover collared sweater is quite nice. The fabric is a 50% viscose, 28% poly, 22% polyamide which is machine washable (preferably in cold water, delicate cycle) and while the instructions suggest hang drying, I'm going to tell you to lay it flat to dry so you don't stretch out the shoulders or get wonky hanger bumps. The fabric is very soft, you shouldn't have a problem with any itchiness or irritation as you would with typical wool. The zipper has a faux leather pull, and the sweater front panel features a woven cable stitch design. The rest of the sweater is a flat weave with drop shoulders, set knit cuffs and hem.  The fit is a little oversize and (hallelujah!) seems true to the size chart. The sleeves are a little long, but the cuffs do allow for folding over or pushing up. It is not cropped, it falls well below the waist. You could definitely wear a t-shirt or button down blouse underneath.  I'm definitely thinking about grabbing another one in the grey. It's a great sweater for the price!

This quarter zip ribbed pullover takes me back to my preppy era and brings a modern twist. It reminds me of the Ralph Lauren sweaters I used to love, but without the hefty price tag. The blend of Viscose, Polyester, and Polyamide feels like a soft knit cotton and gives the sweater a well-made, structured look.  The metal zipper adds a touch of sophistication, making the sweater look more expensive than it is. As summer nights get cooler, it’s perfect for throwing over tank tops or T-shirts and shorts for extra warmth. It also works well over a button-down shirt and trousers for a dressier outfit. The navy blue color is gorgeous, and I’m tempted to get it in a few more colors.

I think this sweater is a really beautiful shade of green. It is true to size and the color matches the images perfectly. The fabric is quite soft and it looks very high end.  The only downfall of this sweater is that the cable knit pattern was not followed through to the back of the sweater.  That would really elevate this product to a 5 star item.Too warm for me to wear in the south right now but maybe in late fall, during winter I will get the chance to wear this.  Price point with a coupon is a good buy.
Ordered my usual Size small in this brand and everything fits!  Gorgeous bright green color and the fabric is nice! :)  **For reference I’ve a 32 bust and 26in waist.**

This Dokotoo Women's Sweater is exactly as pictured Such great quality and it looks good with leggings jeans or dress pants I ordered Navy Blue size Medium It i very soft and comfortable The length is good too Very nice fall & winter pullover

I ordered this to wear as part of my fall and winter wardrobe this year. I ordered the green color and it's very beautiful and vibrant in person, even after washing. The structure of the sweater is very well-made, its Thick material, a great zipper and on the surface, It appears to be a piece that will last along time. I took two stars off, because it began to pill As soon as I washed and dried it the first time. I can probably get away with wearing it one or two more times before it looks to be in very poor shape. For this reason, this is not a sweater that I could recommend

This is my new Favorite sweater. I ordered the grey and it looks nice and rich. The fit is flattering and half zip make the cable knit style looks modern. I will be ordering other Colors. It’s a nice go to basic at a good price.

I love this sweater and will wear it often. I want to order multiple colors. I received the color Parchment which looks like tea stained paper, a very pretty shade between beige and brown. The cable knit is only on the front torso.  The fabric is soft and comfortable against skin. Viscose, polyester and polyamide fabric needs to be washed in cold and hung to dry. The cut is great and I can wear by itself or add a shirt underneath for extra warmth, although it is already a fairly heavy weight sweater. Some advertising photos look like a cropped cut or dolman sleeves but it’s a standard regular fit and length. The leather zipper pull adds a nice quality touch.  It fits true to size and the size chart is accurate. I ordered the medium. I’m 5’3” tall and about 140 pounds.

The material is incredibly soft with an almost angora feel. It’s a heavy sweater so best for winter and too heavy for southern falls. The green is a kelly green. It’s long enough sit low on hips. Very well made.
Basic cotton sweater, nothing special.  Would look great with jeans.
